law.catch_line: In this part the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this part the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Applicant" means an individual who applies for assistance under this part.

"Assistance" means:
cash payments to a recipient; and
payments necessary for supplementary services for a recipient, including:
the recipient's funeral expenses as provided in § 5-415 of this subtitle; and
placement of the recipient in a suitable home or institution if:
the recipient lacks a legal guardian or other person legally responsible for the recipient's support; and
the recipient consents.
"Program" means the Public Assistance to Adults Program.
"Recipient" means an individual who receives, or has received, assistance under this part.
